title: I Want to Wear the Crown
verses: Jesus,my all to heav'n is gone; I want to wear the
go, The way the holy prophets went,I want to wear the
crown, He whom I fix my hopes upon; I want to wear the
crown, The road that leads from banishment; I want to wear the
crown, Oh my heart says praise the Lord, my heart says praise the
crown, Oh my heart says praise the Lord,
my heart says praise the Lord,I want to wear the crown.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Expresses desire for the crown of life and following the path of the prophets
